title: Full Metal Panic! Comic Mission
original_name: フルメタル・パニック！COMIC MISSION
sinopse:
Basically, it's a retanking of some chapters from Full Metal Panic!. It's sort of like FMP! Fumoffu.. meaning that there's no mecha plot line, only short stories. Also there's an extra story not presented anywhere in each volume of this series.

(Source: MU)
